key_talking_points: The Florida Panthers are looking to continue their strong offensive performance after scoring 5 goals already, while the Edmonton Oilers will be trying to tighten up defensively.
Aleksander Barkov (away) wins the opening faceoff against Leon Draisaitl (home) at center ice.
Both teams have played aggressively this season, reflected in their high shot totals.
for_commentary_agent.context: The game has just started, and the momentum is low. This is a good opportunity to provide background information and set the stage for the game.

task_details.specific_guidance: Focus on pre-game analysis, team records, and player statistics.
